original: unfold ReplaceFormulaTerm, isPR. intros n f g. destruct (n eq_nat_dec 0) as [-> | Hn]. - apply codeFormulaInj. + intros. apply codeTermInj. congruence. + intros. congruence. - intros x. destruct x as [i t]. destruct (i eq_nat_dec 1) as [-> | Hi]. + apply fst. apply snd. + apply snd, f, Hn.
